text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

translation.en: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence
translation.id: Dan tidaklah terpecah belah orang-orang Ahli Kitab melainkan setelah datang kepada mereka bukti yang nyata
